entry.title: How to Use Find My Device - Flipe
entry.content:
How to Use Find My Device - Flipe

By flipe.eu.org


Flipe - You must have felt panicked when your cellphone or smartphone was lost. Actually this is a natural thing because in this day and age smartphones are very important objects for everyday life. But now you don't need to worry and feel panic if your smartphone is lost. Have you ever heard of the Find My Device feature? What is Find My Device? This feature can help you easily and quickly track the whereabouts of your smartphone.


The Find My Device feature functions to track and find the position of a lost cell phone. This method is effectively implemented because the process and settings are quite easy, so that the owner can find the cellphone again in a short time, less than 10 minutes. Here's how to track a cell phone using the Find My Device feature.


How to Enable the Find My Device Feature


To find out how to track a cell phone with this feature, you need to make sure of the following according to the instructions quoted from Google Support:


  • Make sure the cellphone or device to be tracked is turned on
  • Make sure you're signed in to a Google Account
  • Make sure the cellphone or device is connected to a Google account and is in active mobile data or Wi-Fi
  • Make sure Google Play is active
  • Make sure the GPS feature on the cellphone or device is active
  • Make sure the Find My Device service is active


 How to Use the Find My Device Feature


After you have successfully ensured that the Find My Device feature can be activated, then the next steps to use the Find My Device feature are as follows:


  • Go to android.com/find via a browser service and sign in to your Google Account. If you have more than one phone, then at the top of the screen click on the missing phone.


  • The lost phone will get a notification. Then from maps or maps, you will get information about the location of the lost cellphone. If the phone can't be found, you'll see its last known location, if available.


  • Next, you can choose what you will do with this Find My Device feature. You can play sound. This way, the phone will ring at maximum volume for 5 minutes, even if the device is set to silent or vibrate mode.


  • You can secure your device by locking your phone with a PIN, pattern or password. Then to help someone get their phone back, you can add a message or phone number to the lock screen.


  • Alternatively, you can wipe the device. This way you will delete all the data on the phone permanently (but not the SD card). However, after you delete the data, the Find My Device feature will not work on the cellphone.
Baca Juga : 5 Software to Create Android Applications

Flipe TECHNOLOGY

One more thing that you need to understand in using the Find My Device feature, if the phone is found after the data has been deleted, you will need the Google Account password again to use it again. You can learn more about device protection.


The Find My Device feature is quite flexible because it can be used on smartphones, as well as PCs or notebooks. With this feature, you no longer need to panic too much when your cellphone or smartphone is lost. Of course, you can easily try this feature to track down the missing cellphone.

entry.title: 5 Software to Create Android Applications Flipe
entry.content:
5 Software to Create Android Applications Flipe

By flipe.eu.org


Flipe Currently, application developers are competing to make the best applications to meet the needs of users. Especially for the Android operating system, there are still many untapped opportunities due to the large market share for Android users.


Creating an application for a smartphone is not difficult. If you already have the basics of programming, you can try to make a simple application. Android applications are currently in great demand. Then what software is needed to make this android application? Here's the explanation!


1. Adobe Flash Builder


Adobe Flash Builder is one of the software for creating Android applications. Many developers use this software to develop games and various other applications.


If you want to operate Adobe Flash Builder, you must first understand the ActionScript language and the open source Flex framework. Adobe Flash Builder is available in two editions, namely standard and premium. According to Adobe itself, it is better to use the premium version with full features for professionals.


2. Andromo


Andromo is one of the best software that you can use to create Android applications without requiring coding skills. Andromo works by generating Java program code for each application that you make and compiling the code through a cloud computing system (Cloud) using the Android SDK.


By using software to create Android applications that have a number of powerful features such as interactive maps, galleries for photos, feeds from social media and much more. In addition, the applications that you create can later be translated into 24 different languages.


3. Lonic


Ionic or also known as Ionic Framework is a framework or software that can be used to create hybrid mobile applications.


That way, you only need to create an application once to immediately release it on various platforms. This software is built on top of AngularJS and Apache Cordova.


In addition, Ionic is equipped with CSS components such as buttons, lists, forms, grids, tabs, etc., as well as HTML5 and Sass.


4. Android Studio


Android Studio is one of the most used software for creating Android applications. This software is the official IDE (Integrated Development Environment) software from Google which is used to create Android applications.

Flipe TECHNOLOGY



You can use the Java, Kotlin, and C++ programming languages to develop applications using Android Studio. This software is equipped with a feature-rich and fast emulator. Additionally, Android Studio has extensive testing tools and frameworks.


Android Studio has quite complete features. This software, which has a flexible Gradle-based versioning system, offers an integrated environment for all Android devices. Android Studio also includes Instant Run which allows you to push changes to a running application without the need to create a new application.


5. Eclipse


Eclipse software was developed using the Java programming language. But don't worry if you want to use C++, Python, Perl, Php, and other programming languages. Eclipse also supports these programming languages.


Eclipse is software for creating Android applications on all platforms. With its open source nature, Eclipse has many features that you can use to develop the application you want. The plugins provided are quite complete as in Android Studio.


Eclipse is one of the software that can be used to create Android applications that are best known by developers. Eclipse is quite user friendly software and has a more flexible Gradle build system even compared to Android Studio. This software is also easier to use by beginners.


So, which software do you want to use to create great apps on Android? You can use either one. When it comes to investing in mutual funds, there is only one application that you can use, namely the Seeds application, because there is a robo advisor feature that can help beginners.

entry.title: How to Activate OK Google Flipe
entry.content:
How to Activate OK Google Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe - Google Assistant is one of the most advanced products ever made by Google. However, did you know that there are various Google Assistant functions that can make your work easier? This Google product, which was launched in May 2016, has been used on more than 1 billion devices, as written by Think with Google.


Its presence was warmly welcomed by Google users. So, it's no wonder that 500 million people are using Google Assistant by early 2020, as quoted from Business Insider. Google Assistant is an interesting product for Google users. The reason is, this one product can be connected with various other Google products, such as Gmail, Google Calendar, and Google Keep and many more. Google Assistant is perfect for those of you who often do multitasking. Imagine if you are being chased by a deadline but need to send an important message to your co-workers. Of course it would be troublesome, right?


Well, you can use Google Assistant to help you.


You just need to say, "OK Google, send a text message to (friend name)." Then, you can say what message you want to convey to your co-worker.


This smart Google Assistant named OK Google can be commanded by voice to do various things. Here's how to activate what you can do.


How to Activate on Android


Generally this feature is available for all Android devices. If you find that your cellphone isn't equipped with this feature, don't worry because it can be downloaded independently using the Google Play Store. It should also be understood, that Google Assistant can only run for the Android 5.0 operating system or later and Google version 6.12 or later as well. Therefore, first make sure your device is compatible to operate this Google Assistant.


If your device already supports it, you can simply enter settings.


you just need to go to settings > Google > Account services > Search, Assistant & Voice > Google Assistant. Later the configuration of Google's virtual assistant can be changed according to your wishes. For example, you can teach Google Assistant to recognize voices when you call it when you say "OK Google" in the "Voice Match" option. The Google Assistant only appears if saying “OK Google” is a person whose voice has been recognized. Another way to summon Google Assistant is by pressing and holding the "Home" button. Apart from that, you can also choose the language you want when giving commands to Google Assistant.

Flipe TECHNOLOGY


Enabling OK Google on iOS


Apple devices are actually equipped with technology similar to Google Assistant, called Siri. Even so, on iOS devices you can still use Google Assistant or OK Google. Before carrying out the configuration, iOS devices must first download the Google Assistant application independently through the Apple App Store. Please note that Google Assistant can only be used for Apple devices that are running the iOS 11 operating system or later.


When it's installed, you can open the Google Assistant application and log in using a Google account. After that, all you have to do is tap on the profile photo to carry out the configuration. Because Google Assistant is a virtual assistant. You only need to call it when you want to use it. There are several ways that iOS users can call Google Assistant. There is a difference with Android devices, iOS users cannot activate Google Assistant by saying "OK Google" or "Hey Google".


The way to call it is to open Google Assistant first. Then you as an iOS user can give instructions via the microphone icon or keywords that are available.


Easy enough isn't it to activate OK Google on your device? Just like investing in mutual funds, you can easily do it with the Seeds application. What's more, it's enough with 100 thousand you can already invest. Come on, invest now so that your future is guaranteed!

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.





Flipe - Admittedly, this pandemic has prompted a change in people's habits. The existence of social restrictions and the appeal to #stayhome "forces" many people to fill their spare time with home-based activities.


One way to entertain yourself, which is becoming a new lifestyle pattern, is to watch streaming shows or subscribed videos online. A McKinsey & Company survey at the end of March said that as many as 45% of respondents spent more on home entertainment during the pandemic.


On the other hand, 85% of respondents reduced their spending on outdoor entertainment.


Subscription video streaming services (video-on-demand/VoD) are one of the entertainment options that can be done at home. So, it's not surprising that various platforms have sprung up offering films or series that can attract attention during a pandemic like today. One of them is WeTV, a video streaming service. WeTV, owned by a technology giant from China, Tencent, is expanding in Indonesia. This online application-based platform is committed to advancing Indonesia's potential entertainment industry by presenting shows from China, Thailand and Indonesia. Here's the full WeTV story!


Coming in 2019


WeTV is an application-based platform and website for technology company Tencent China, and is entering the Indonesian market targeting the growing segment of Asian drama fans, including millennials.


Head of Business Development and Marketing of PT Tencent Technology Indonesia Lesley Simpson said that his company had decided to enter the Indonesian market at the end of 2019 due to the increasing popularity of Asian dramas. After two decades, the popularity of Asian dramas in Indonesia is rising again. Especially now, Mandarin drama scripts are packaged more relevant to everyday life and are also close to the daily lives of audiences in Indonesia.


One of the advantages that will be given to the market in Indonesia is various series that can be watched for free on the WeTV application. Another advantage is the global broadcast schedule for various WeTV series, so viewers outside of China, including Malaysia, Thailand, the Philippines, India, Taiwan, Vietnam and Indonesia, can watch a variety of top series simultaneously around the world.

Flipe TECHNOLOGY



Collaborating with MD Pictures


In 2020, WeTV has also started collaborating with MD Picture. WeTV Indonesia collaborates with MD Pictures in improving the quality of local film content. Lesley Simpson, Country Manager of WeTV and iflix Indonesia said, WeTV wants to support the Indonesian entertainment industry in producing higher quality content and providing more jobs for the creative industries for cast and crew.


Through collaboration with MD, we will enrich the diversification of digital libraries available on the WeTV platform to be enjoyed by viewers throughout Indonesia and abroad




In collaboration with Trans TV


Not only with MD Picture, in 2021, WeTV, the international video streaming platform from Tencent Video, announced a collaboration with TRANS TV, a CT Corp business unit in the media, lifestyle and entertainment sectors. This strategic step is a form of WeTV's commitment to support the growth of the entertainment industry in Indonesia.


The collaboration between WeTV and TRANS TV is in the form of providing quality entertainment content from WeTV to be broadcast on Trans TV channels, starting with broadcasting WeTV Original Cinta Fitri. The series, starring Tissa Biani and Rizky Nazar, can be watched via Trans TV starting November 15, 2021. Apart from WeTV Original, a number of WeTV's other superior content will also be broadcast, including popular dramas from China.

entry.title: Oppo A92 specifications and prices Flipe
entry.content:
Oppo A92 specifications and prices Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.


Flipe - Oppo Indonesia has flooded the mainstream smartphone market with their A series. Including the Oppo A92 which offers various advantages in its class.


As a filler for the Oppo A series, the Oppo A92 was introduced with a series of sophistication that makes it mandatory for you to consider before buying a new device and before proposing to this device. OPPO A92 is a smartphone produced by a vendor from China, OPPO, which runs Color OS 7.1 based on Android 10.


From its name, OPPO A92 is the successor of OPPO A91. It's just that the release time of these two phones tends to be close. OPPO A91 officially arrived in Indonesia in March 2020. Meanwhile, OPPO A92 arrived in May 2020. Apart from the close release time, the two cellphones are also in the same price class. Then what are the specifications and price?


Neo Display screen


OPPO A92 has a relatively good screen. This phone offers a 6.5-inch display with a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. This screen has a screen density of 405 ppi. While OPPO claims that the screen of this cellphone has a brightness level of up to 480 nits.


OPPO calls this screen technology Neo-Display. The screen feels fuller thanks to the screen to body ratio which reaches 90.50%. In addition, the OPPO A92 screen is equipped with technology that aims to make the wearer's eyes comfortable. This technology is TÜV Rheinland certified eye protection technology. Thanks to this technology, the brightness of the OPPO A92 screen can adapt and adjust to the surrounding conditions.


OPPO A92 is also equipped with the Eye Care feature. This feature can be activated if the user wants the mobile screen to have visuals that don't strain and tire the eyes.

Flipe TECHNOLOGY

ColorOS 7.1 Based on Android 10


OPPO A92 comes offering Color OS 7.1 based on Android 10. The presence of ColorOS 7.1 on this phone is a distinct advantage considering that ColorOS now offers more attractive features and provides a good display for the user experience.


ColorOS 7.1 provides many interesting features that make it different from previous versions of ColorOS. An example is the presence of the Quick Tools feature on the side of the screen, automatic customized icons, dark mode options, and others. These features clearly provide an interesting experience in using OPPO A92.


Side Fingerprint Sensor


OPPO A92 features fingerprint sensor technology on the side, integrated with the power button. This option seems to have been chosen to provide a different experience in using OPPO phones. Considering that most OPPO phones have a fingerprint sensor on the back or on the screen.


The use of the fingerprint sensor on the side is a distinct advantage. With the position of the fingerprint sensor on the side and together with the power button, the process of opening this cellphone feels faster.


Oppo A92 price


Launched in Indonesia at the end of 2020, the Oppo A92 with 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal memory was sold at IDR 3,599,000. and is available in two color choices, namely Twilight Black and Aurora Purple. This new Oppo cellphone was officially sold on November 1, 2020.

entry.title: BUYING SHARIA SHARE AT ONE TIME VS BUYING PARTIALLY SHARIA SHARE Flipe
entry.content:
BUYING SHARIA SHARE AT ONE TIME VS BUYING PARTIALLY SHARIA SHARE Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.


Buying stocks often creates a dilemma for novice investors because they are still confused about allocating their capital, investors are also confused about determining the right strategy to buy shares. In general, buying shares can be done in two ways, namely buying shares once at a time & buying shares in partial installments, and some are purchased afterward depending on the situation and market conditions.



Buying by installments can be divided again. Investors can buy one share more than twice or even buy shares 5 times, whether the price is increasing or experiencing a price decrease in the stock market, better known as an averaging strategy, whether it's averaging up or averaging down.


Now the question that arises is which strategy is good to use? is it averaging up or averaging down? or buy shares at once?


All data strategies are very good and have risks and levels of profit that can be generated in terms of investing. Buying stocks at once is generally good to use if you have confidence in the movement of stocks that your analytical partners will experience a significant increase in price resulting in large profits compared to use the average down or average up strategy for all of you.


For example, Fulan bought 800 lots of ANTM shares at a price of 690. If Fulan sells them at a price of 920, you can get a profit of 230 (920-690). However, if you buy ANTM in part or by using the average up strategy, it consists of as many as 200 at 670, and you buy another 300 when the price rises to 700 then buy again at 720 for 300 lots, colleagues sell at 920, then your profit will be smaller.


Flipe investasi.

Partners only get a profit of IDR 220 ((920-700).

Flipe investasi

From the two examples of calculating the two strategies above, there is a difference of 10 Rupiah that is larger using the strategy of buying shares at once. So it produces greater profits than the averaging up strategy above. But is it true that we will always be able to do the analysis correctly, what if we don't do the analysis correctly where it turns out that we buy shares at the PEAK PRICE, which is where the price is the highest and will have the greatest potential to experience a sharp decline in stock prices.


This will certainly affect the psychological side of investors because if it is too late to determine the acceptable cutloss percentage, the risk that will be accepted is the loss on the transaction which is so large.


Buying stocks in installments is also good. Generally, buying partial shares is one way to test whether the stock price will actually increase or not or we call it a test of the water. Even if it turns out that tomorrow the price has decreased and requires a cut loss, at least the loss is only a little because you didn't put too much capital in the stock.


When the stock price has reached its lowest point and starts to rise, you can then do averaging up by buying back the shares. However, as I explained earlier, the drawback of this strategy is that the profit you get is smaller than if you buy shares directly without installments, even though the risk is also smaller than buying in a lump sum.


The concept of the Yuk Nabung Saham campaign is basically a campaign so that people can save consistently by buying certain shares in installments over a certain period.

link.title: BUYING SHARIA SHARE AT ONE TIME VS BUYING PARTIALLY SHARIA SHARE Flipe

entry.title: Tips for Reducing Sugar Consumption for Diabetics Flipe
entry.content:
Tips for Reducing Sugar Consumption for Diabetics Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.

Flipe -Reducing sugar intake is beneficial not only for people who want to prevent diabetes, but also for diabetics themselves, as this is one way to control blood sugar levels. Here are tips to reduce sugar consumption for diabetics!


Tips for Reducing Sugar Consumption for Diabetics

These things are part of the tips to reduce sugar consumption for diabetics:



1. Check Added Sugar Levels on Food Labels


It is important to distinguish natural sugars (which are found naturally in food) from added sugars. Fruit, vegetables, whole grains and dairy products all contain natural sugars.



Adding sugar to the processing of a food increases the amount of calories and carbohydrates in the food consumed, which can cause health problems.



2. Choose Natural Foods, not Processed Foods


While checking food labels is important for reducing sugar intake, it's better to eat foods that don't contain added sugar, namely natural foods, such as:


  • Fruits and vegetables
  • Whole grains
  • Lean meat, fish and seafood
  • Egg
  • Dairy products (low fat or skim)

 

3. Quality Breakfast


The average Indonesian breakfast is high in sugar and carbohydrates which can increase blood sugar levels. Try consuming a breakfast that is healthier and lower in sugar or even has no added sugar at all, for example whole grain bread or whole grain bread with eggs and avocado.

Flipe healthy

4. Avoid Consuming Sweet Drinks


Drinks such as soda, sports drinks, juice, coffee with added sugar and other drinks high in sugar should be avoided. Reducing sugary drinks can significantly lower sugar intake. Diabetics should drink water, tea without sugar or coffee without sugar.



5. Replace sugar when making cakes


If you want to reduce your daily sugar intake, then reducing your intake of sweet pastries needs to be done. However, this does not mean that Diabestfriends cannot eat cake at all.

 


As an alternative to sweet cakes, make cakes with alternative recipes that use safe sugar substitutes. Try asking your doctor about safe sugar substitutes for Diabestfriends. It should also be noted that some artificial sweeteners, such as aspartame and saccharin, are not suitable for making cakes. However, stevia may be suitable for baking.

 


6. Use Natural Spices


Try making dishes or cakes using natural spices instead of table sugar. Examples of natural spices such as vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and others. Replacing sugar with natural spices can give a unique and delicious taste too, you know, so Diabestfriends can still enjoy it.

 


7. Eat Dark Chocolate


Dark chocolate is generally lower in sugar than milk chocolate or white chocolate. Dark chocolate still contains sugar, but this is the best choice if Diabestfriends are craving chocolate. But it's best to first consult with your doctor about safe portions for Diabestfriends

link.title: Tips for Reducing Sugar Consumption for Diabetics Flipe

entry.title: 5 Types of Happiness, Which Are You Experiencing? Flipe
entry.content:
5 Types of Happiness, Which Are You Experiencing? Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.


Flipe -Here are 5 types of happiness you need to know. Happiness is easy to get, but unfortunately many people don't realize it. Don't let you be one of them, okay!:

1. Pride


Have you ever completed a project or task that was quite challenging? Or have you ever volunteered out of your own free will? Situations like these would likely trigger a sense of pride from within your body.

Pride is a form of happiness. Pride is often associated with the negative emotion of being overly competitive. However, pride in our achievements is a type of happiness that needs to be enjoyed.

2. Establish Relationships with Others


Many believe that money is the secret to a happy life. However, research at Harvard in 1938 showed that our relationship with how happy we are in our relationships with other people has a large role in our health.

People who are socially closer to family, friends and community tend to be happier. They are also physically fitter and have a longer life.

Flipe healthy

3. Satisfaction


Contentment means being happy with what you have, who you are, and where you are right now. Contentment means appreciating the reality of the moment, appreciating what you have and where you are right now in life.

Having contentment does not mean not having desires, but rather that you are satisfied with the current state of affairs and believe the best is yet to come. Many people today think that life is a game where we have to be the best at everything. Rarely does anyone set aside time to rest, relax, and be grateful for what has been achieved.

4. Have fun


Even though you're an adult, it doesn't mean you have to work all the time. In our busy and modern days, many are so focused on work and family commitments, that they never have time for complete enjoyment.

Having fun can add joy to your life, relieve stress, and connect you to other people and the world around you. Having fun can give you positive feelings, such as happiness, pride, and hope. Find an activity or hobby that you enjoy so you can have fun!

5. Gratitude


Gratitude and gratitude are the highest forms of thought and are happiness. Choosing to be grateful and thankful can be an easy way to increase happiness.

entry.title: The Impact of Blue Light on Eye Health, How to Prevent It? Flipe
entry.content:
The Impact of Blue Light on Eye Health, How to Prevent It? Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.


Flipe -Did you know that gadgets such as cellphones, laptops, tablets, and others that we use for daily activities actually produce blue light or blue light which is harmful to health, especially eye health.

Blue light should be watched out for because it can have a negative effect on sleep patterns and cause various eye diseases. Here's the full explanation.

What is Blue Light?
According to eye health science, blue light or blue light is visible light with a short wavelength, around 415 to 455 nm and has a high energy level. The biggest natural source of this blue light is the sun. Apart from the sun, blue light can also come from various digital screens, including:

  • Television,
  • Gadgets or cellphones,
  • laptop Screen,
  • And other electronic equipment.
 
It should also be noted that during the day, humans are often exposed to blue light from sunlight. Blue light during the day has the benefit of improving one's mood.

Impact of Blue Light on Eye Health
What is the impact of blue light on the eyes? Blue light or blue light becomes something that is harmful to eye health when a person is exposed to too much exposure that comes from electronic device screens at night.

The various effects of blue light or blue light that you should be aware of, are as follows:

1. Impairs circadian rhythms

Excessive blue light at night can cause a decrease in the production of the hormone melatonin, the hormone responsible for regulating a person's sleep cycle.

Normally, a person's body produces a small amount of the hormone melatonin during the day, then the amount increases at certain times. The hormone melatonin will reach its peak production at midnight.

Exposure to too much blue light at night will result in a delayed sleep schedule.

According to the National Institute of General Medical Sciences, changes in circadian rhythms or cycles can cause sleep disturbances and can lead to chronic illnesses, such as obesity, depression, and bipolar disorder.



2. Causes damage to the retina

The human eye does not have sufficient protection against exposure to blue light, both from sunlight and from electronic equipment, such as gadgets.

A study from Harvard University states that blue light has long been identified as the most harmful light for the retina and can cause long-term effects in the form of damage.

Disorders that will be experienced when exposed to excessive gadget light, have a high risk of getting: glaucoma, macular degeneration and degenerative retinal disease.

Flipe healthy


3. Increased risk of cataracts

Please note that the lens of the eye is able to filter out short-wave light easily. This can protect the retina from eye damage caused by blue light or blue light.

However, while the lens is providing a protective effect for the retina, it actually suffers from decreased discoloration, which results in the formation of cataracts. Sun exposure is also a risk factor for cataracts.

If you are exposed to blue light too often from gadgets or other electronic devices, you may be more at risk of experiencing a decrease in the function of the eye lens, making it easier for you to develop cataracts.

4. Causing eye fatigue

Nowadays, most people spend their time in front of gadget screens. This activity can cause a condition known as eye fatigue or what is known as digital eye strain which can affect a person's productivity. Symptoms caused by digital eye strain include:

- Hard to focus,

- Vision gets blurry,

- Irritation and dry eyes,

- Headache, and Neck


Apart from the distance between the eyes and the screen and the time it is used, the blue light transferred by the gadget screen also plays an active role as a factor for eye fatigue.

Ways To Reduce The Impact Of Blue Light On Gadgets


When exposure to blue light from gadgets, tablets, computers or laptops already interferes with eye health, there are several ways you can do to reduce it, including the following.

  • Use anti-radiation glasses to block blue light or blue light.
  • Reduce screen-time to rest your eyes.
  • Instead of using blue light, it can be replaced with a dim red light at night.
  • Install anti-radiation on the gadget screen.
  • Turn off electronic devices before going to bed and turn off lights at bedtime.

link.title: The Impact of Blue Light on Eye Health, How to Prevent It? Flipe

entry.title: 4 Banks in Indonesia Presenting Virtual Credit Cards Services Flipe
entry.content:
4 Banks in Indonesia Presenting Virtual Credit Cards Services Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.



Flipe -Virtual Credit Card (VCC) is a means of payment for online transactions that is very popular in Indonesia. The way to use it is by entering the 16-digit VCC number before making a transaction.

Later, that number will be a sign of payment authorization with the last 3 digits as the card verification value (CVV) code. Basically, this number is valid for a maximum of only 24 hours. As for other transactions, the card owner must request another number through a process determined by each virtual card issuer.

Virtual credit cards, also known as VCC, are very popular in Indonesia.

Moreover, a number of well-known banks have also issued this one product. So, if you want to have it, you can come directly to the relevant bank, to apply for a virtual credit card.

Virtual credit card (VCC) aka virtual credit card is a means of payment for online transactions which is already popular in Indonesia. Here are 4 Banks that present their services.

1. BNI Debit Online


One of the banks that has a virtual credit card service is BNI Debit online, with the SMS Banking system.

To be able to have BNI Debit Online and enjoy its features, you first need to have a BNI bank account.

After registering and activating, you only need to type "REQ VCN <amount of money to be used for the transaction>" and send it to the number that has been set. After following the request process, the VCN will be sent to the cellphone.

For information, this 16-digit number is valid for two hours, starting from the time it is received and can only be used once. However, the weakness is that the only providers that work with BNI are Telkomsel, Indosat and XL. This service is also not accessible via internet banking.

Flipe bank

2. MNC Bank


In 2021, MNC Bank or PT Bank MNC Internasional Tbk (BABP), a subsidiary of PT MNC Kapital Indonesia Tbk (BCAP), which operates a digital banking application called MotionBanking, partnered with Visa Indonesia.

This collaboration is applied in a credit card called MotionVisa. MotionVisa is the first virtual credit card in Indonesia with sophisticated Artificial Intelligence-based credit scoring. MotionVisa is connected directly to the Population and Civil Registry Service (Dukcapil), resulting in instant approval and much faster credit decisions.

This MotionVisa will be attached to the MotionBanking application, a digital banking service from BABP through the "apply credit card" feature. Immediately after being approved, customers can use the MotionVisa for various online transactions. Holders are also given the freedom to submit their cards in physical form through the MotionBanking application.

3. BCA KlikPay


BCA KlikPay is a virtual credit card (VCC) product, which is part of the list of the best virtual credit cards in Indonesia.

How could it not be, this VCC article requires its users to enter a user ID and password on the KlikPay site so they can make transactions.

The user ID and password can be obtained by way of registration and activation, which is done through KlikBCA.com. One interesting thing about this virtual credit card is that customers can choose the source of funds to use for KlikPay, either from a BCA debit or credit card account.


4. Mandiri Debit Online


Mandiri Debit Online, is also included in the list of virtual credit cards in Indonesia.

Actually, between Mandiri Debit Online and BNI Debit Online are not much different. It's just that VCC from bank Mandiri focuses on using One Time Password (OTP), or what is also known as a one-time use password.

In addition, you will not be sent a 16-digit VCN number, such as BNI Debit Online. This is because the VCC payment authorization from bank Mandiri uses the three-digit CVV number on the Mandiri debit card. Meanwhile, authentication is carried out using an OTP provided via SMS. If you are interested in Mandiri Debit Online, then you can apply directly to Bank Mandiri, or via Internet banking.

Those were 4 banks that provide virtual credit cards for your transaction convenience. For ease of investing in mutual funds, you just need to download the Seeds! It's easy, safe and makes you more money!

link.title: 4 Banks in Indonesia Presenting Virtual Credit Cards Services Flipe

Flipe -Easy Ways to Save at Bank BTN - Saving money is a positive activity and currently many banks provide savings products with various facilities, one of which is Bank BTN.


BTN or State Savings Bank is one of the banks managed by the government.


Bank BTN is committed to serving and providing housing sector financing through three main products, individual banking, business and sharia.


How to save at Bank BTN


One of the banking products issued by BTN is BTN Bara.


Batara Savings provides a solution for people who want to save. By opening a Batara BTN account there are many advantages.


Then how to save a good and easy if you already have a savings account?


So, for those who are still confused about how to save at a bank, here's how to save at BTN.



How to Save Through a Teller

If you already have a savings account at BTN, you can deposit money through a bank teller that you can visit at the nearest BTN branch.


This method is the easiest way, namely:


  1. Come directly to the nearest BTN branch office
  2. Then take the queue number
  3. Next fill out the deposit slip
  4. Wait for the queue number to be called.
  5. If you have been called, submit your savings book and the money to be deposited
  6. Then wait a few moments, the teller will process your transaction
  7. After completion, the bank teller will return the passbook

When you are going to save through a bank teller, you should prepare a passbook and money to be deposited from home. This is done for your convenience.


Saving through ATM BTN Cash Deposit (CDM)


BTN Cash Deposit ATM is an ATM machine that can accept cash deposits making it easier for customers to make transactions, fast and realtime.


The conditions for making a cash deposit at a BTN ATM are:


  • BTN cash deposit ATMs can accept denominations of IDR 20,000, IDR 50,000 and IDR 100,000
  • The money to be deposited is neat, not torn, no staples, not bound and neatly arranged like a teller when counting customer money
  • Not every city has this type of ATM. Only available at certain branch offices and certain ATM galleries

If the conditions above have been met, now you can make a cash deposit easily, namely by:


  1. Visit Bank BTN or ATM gallery where there are ATM cash deposit machines
  2. Insert ATM Card
  3. Enter the PIN correctly
  4. Select the cash deposit menu
  5. The money box will open, enter the money you want to deposit, the box closes and wait for the money counting process
  6. If the amount of money deposited is appropriate then confirm the deposit. You can make a deposit to your own account or to another account
  7. If the transaction is successful, a proof of transaction receipt will appear
  8. Then end the transaction

Note: please be careful when conducting banking transactions. Do not tell the ATM PIN to other people, even if the person is a bank officer.

Flipe bank

2 Selected BTN Savings

So, if you don't have an account yet and are planning to create an account, here's a quick review of the deposit product from the BTN bank.


BTN Batara

BTN Batara is a savings product with various conveniences and facilities.


Savings deposits can be made at Bank BTN Outlets and Post Offices or through the Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) / ATM BTN Cash Deposit.


The initial deposit is light when opening a BTN Batara savings account, namely Rp. 200,000, you already have an account.


The next deposit is IDR 10,000. The minimum balance in a savings account is IDR 50,000.


Profit:


  • Customers get mobile banking and internet banking facilities
  • Visa ATM card for transactions anywhere without limits
  • Account opening can be done online through BTN Open Account
  • Like-Suka ATM card facilities

My Savings BTN

KU BTN Savings is a savings plan for the future through this product.


Just like the BTN Batara Savings, a light deposit, namely Rp. 20,000, you can open the account.


The minimum balance contained in the account is Rp. 20,000, for the next deposit it is a minimum of Rp. 10,000.


Subsequent deposits can be made very easily through Bank BTN Outlets in all parts of Indonesia.



Profit:


  • Ease of purchasing various kinds of bill payments
  • Transactions can be done anywhere without limits
  • Improving banking understanding from an early age
  • Foster a culture of saving
  • Train independence and financial management for the future

How to open KU BTN Savings, namely:


  1. Prepare complete documents and sufficient money for the first deposit. Photocopy of e-KTP, FC NPWP
  2. Visit the nearest Bank BTN Outlet
  3. Meet the Customer Service section to open a BTN Tabunganku savings account
  4. Fill out the form and submit all the documents that have been prepared
  5. Follow all procedures directed by Customer Service
  6. The BTN Tabunganku savings account is ready to be used

For more information, please visit the branch

How to Check BCA Transfers at ATMs, M-Banking & KlikBCA Flipe

by flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.

Flipe -There are many options for how to check BCA mutations that can be done by customers. For those who are not busy, they can do it through an ATM. Another option is to use Mobile Banking, SMS Banking, and Internet Banking.


Apart from the method above, you can also go to a BCA branch office, but this method is less effective, especially when you have to queue at the teller. The rest just adjust to your needs.


One fairly easy way is to use an ATM, if previously the internet, m-banking and SMS banking services were already active, this is a practical choice because you don't have to move from your seat.


Definition and Use of Account Movements


What exactly is account death? Account movements are all records or transaction history contained in a bank account, whether in the form of outgoing funds or incoming funds.



Account mutation has functions for:


  • To control all banking transactions that have been carried out both incoming and outgoing funds
  • Movement of accounts, very helpful for the smooth running of business for entrepreneurs
  • To report all transactions that occur in an account


An Easy Way to Check BCA Account Movements

It is possible that there are some customers who have difficulty checking mutations, especially for those who open a savings account for the first time.


The following are several ways that can be done to check mutations by banking customers.


How to Check BCA Account Movements via ATM

Transferring an account through an ATM can be done quite easily, that is, you just have to follow the steps below.


  1. Visit the nearest BCA ATM machine
  2. Insert ATM card
  3. Select the language and enter the ATM card PIN correctly
  4. Then select the Other Transactions menu
  5. Select Information
  6. Account Movement Options. Later a receipt will appear containing mutation information
  7. Done, end the transaction through the ATM if there is no need anymore

The receipt that just came out of the ATM machine contains mutation information, but only for the last 5 transactions.

Flipe bank


If you want to find out more, as mentioned above, you can do it through the nearest branch or by using internet banking services.


How to Check BCA Movements Through Mobile Banking

  1. Please open the BCA Mobile Banking application
  2. Click the m-BCA menu
  3. Enter the BCA Mobile access code correctly
  4. Next, tap the m-Info menu
  5. Tap the Account Mutation menu
  6. Next select the type of transaction
  7. Adjust the desired mutation period
  8. Tap send and enter the BCA Mobile Banking PIN correctly

How to Check BCA Movements via KlikBCA / Internet Banking

  1. Please open your favorite browser on your laptop or computer
  2. Open the BCA internet banking site at https://ibank.klikbca.com/
  3. Enter the correct BCA internet banking User ID and PIN
  4. Then click Login to enter the BCA internet banking service
  5. Please select Account Information
  6. Next, click Account Mutation


Final Word

By following the steps mentioned above, you can easily check BCA Bank account mutations. Such is the information that tipskita.com can summarize.


For further information, please visit the nearest Bank BCA work unit or contact the call center at 1500888.

link.title: How to Check BCA Transfers at ATMs, M-Banking & KlikBCA Flip

As for registering at an ATM, it's also not difficult as long as you follow the steps correctly.

 

All you have to do is find an ATM machine to register the number you want to activate, here are the steps.


  1. Enter the ATM Card and Input PIN
  2. Select the Other Transactions menu
  3. Select the Registration menu
  4. Select the sms banking menu
  5. Create a 6 digit SMS Banking PIN
  6. Enter the phone number you want to use for SMS banking
  7. If successful, a receipt will appear indicating that the service registration was successful

Registration via ATM can only be used for non-cash (financial) transactions. To activate financial services through BRI work units.


Check BRI Balance Via SMS Banking


Checking balances by SMS is very easy to do, provided that the number has been registered according to personal data in the savings book.


If you have registered, SMS banking services can easily be done anywhere and anytime.


SMS banking is often the right way to get information about the balance in a passbook when there is no internet connection so you cannot maximize e-banking or mobile banking.


Or when you are in a position far from the ATM machine or have trouble finding it. The method is quite easy, namely with the following steps.


  1. Open the SMS menu on the cellphone.
  2. Then type in the format: SALDOPin ATM.
  3. Send to 3300
  4. Example: BALANCE 123456 send sms to 3300

If it has been sent, it won't take long for a reply SMS to show the amount of the balance in the BRI savings book.

Advantages of SMS Banking

Many SMS banking has indeed left it along with the current developments.


Moreover, with the existence of the internet which has an increasingly vital role, this service is only used under certain conditions.

 

However, the sms banking service has advantages compared to other services.


Does not require Internet connection

Unlike e-banking and mobile banking which requires an internet connection to use it.


SMS banking only needs a provider's signal that is connected to the central service.


Of course, getting a provider's signal is easier than getting an internet signal, right?


Does not require special cellphone specifications

The next advantage is that it can be done using any type of cellphone. Even the simplest type is what matters is being able to send sms.


Unlike the latest services that require a smartphone with special technology, of course, the price is above average.


Faster and more practical

Finally, it is faster and more practical to get information about balances.


If you use an ATM machine or use other services, it takes time and steps.


Meanwhile, by using the SMS service, you just need to type and send, so you can easily check BRI's SMS banking balance.

entry.title: How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Flipe
entry.content:
How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Flipe

by flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.
Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.


Flipe -Tips on how to use a BCA credit card for the first time are very important. This is because there are still many people who have not been able to use their BCA credit cards properly and efficiently, especially when using them as a payment method for goods purchased.

Later, we will discuss how to use BCA credit cards efficiently and correctly. For that, see this article to the end.

What is a BCA Credit Card?
The BCA credit card is a card originating from Bank BCA which has a function as a payment method, where payment will be deferred first by the bank and then the installment payment will be charged to the owner of the BCA account every month.
 
 

By having a BCA credit card, you usually get a discount on certain goods or products that you want to buy.

Or a BCA credit card can be used for those who want to get easy monthly installments when making payments.

But even though a credit card has many advantages for you, there are other things that must be considered in each use.

When you have a BCA credit card, you should be able to use it more wisely, so that you don't have a limit on usage and don't charge a lot.

Tips on How to Use a BCA Credit Card for the First Time
Knowing how to use a BCA credit card efficiently is something you must understand.


This is said to be important because in order to avoid excessive use and others. Here are ways to use a BCA credit card correctly.

Determine the Right Budget
Determining a budget when using a BCA credit card is an important thing to do. This is because you can synchronize between BCA credit cards for shopping.

For this, the bank will help determine the maximum limit that you can use on a BCA credit card. However, it is still recommended to choose a limit that really suits your needs.

Understand the Terms and Conditions for Using BCA Credit Cards
Using a credit card is not something you can take advantage of at will. We recommend that before using it as a payment method, you should know in advance about the terms and conditions for using a BCA credit card.

Flipe -This disease occurs when there is a disorder in the two jaws near the ear. You should know more about the symptoms of temporomandibular joint syndrome so that you can do prevention and care to relieve the symptoms that you experience.


Alert symptoms of temporomandibular joint syndrome

Temporomandibular joint is a joint that connects the lower jaw (mandibular) to the skull. The joints are on both sides of the head and are in front of the ear. This joint is quite important because it helps the jaw to open and close when you talk, eat, to chew.


Until now the exact cause of the temporomandibular joint syndrome is not known with certainty. However, there are several risk factors that cause this condition to occur, such as jaw injuries, the habit of gritting teeth, suffering from arthritis, to connective tissue diseases that affect the joints.


This condition is very vulnerable to the age group 20-40 years. In addition, women experience this disease more often than men. To take care, you should know the various symptoms that are the health complaints of this disease, such as:


  • Pain in the ear area to the neck.
  • Jaw muscles that become stiff.
  • Limited jaw movement.
  • Difficulty chewing.
  • Pain in the jaw area when opening the mouth.
  • Locked jaw.
  • Damage to the teeth.
  • Vertigo.
  • Headache.
  • Jaw shift.
  • Tinnitus.
  • Swelling in the temporomandibular joint area.

Temporomandibular joint syndrome examination

This disease can be seen when you do a regular dental health check. Usually the doctor will observe the movement of opening and closing his mouth and emphasizing the face to ensure the uncomfortable part.


If the doctor suspects you experience it, there are some further examinations you need to do, such as:


Panoramic Xray. This examination will provide an overview of the condition of the tooth to the jaw.

CBCT scan. This examination will capture thousands of images about the condition of teeth and jaw. Later the image catch will be combined into a detailed picture.

MRI Scan. This examination is carried out to ensure the condition of soft tissue in the jaw joint. This examination also makes a doctor or medical team know the joint function can function properly or not.

Flipe healthy

Treatment and treatment

In somewhat mild disorders, this disease does not require special treatment. However, if the symptoms cause disorders of activity, immediately overcome with various treatments, such as:


1. Medicines

The use of drugs can relieve symptoms associated with this disease. There are several types of drugs to relieve symptoms, such as pain relievers and anti -inflammatory, antidepressants, to rigid muscle relievers.


2. Therapy

Therapy can also be used as a treatment. Usually, therapy serves to increase the strength of the jaw muscles to help you avoid various activities that can trigger the condition getting worse.


3. Surgery

If drugs and therapy cannot overcome the problems you experience, the medical team can suggest surgery to overcome this problem.


4. Home Care

In addition to medical treatment, you also need to do home treatment so that this condition will improve immediately. There are some treatments that you can do, such as:


Reducing jaw movements.

Eating soft foods.

Avoid chewing hard foods.

Perform warm -up movements for the jaw.

Compress using warm or cold water to relieve pain.

Those are some things you need to know about the temporomandibular joint syndrome.

Flipe -Worms become one of the diseases caused by parasitic infections in the body. Not only in children, in fact this disease is also vulnerable to adults. If you do not get the right treatment, intestinal worms can cause health problems that are getting worse.


In addition to maintaining cleanliness of the body, you can also overcome worms using worms for adults. There are various types of drugs that you can consume as a treatment for intestinal worms. However, make sure you take worm medicine in accordance with the advice and dose of the doctor to avoid unwanted side effects.


Type of worm medicine for adults

People with worms can experience some health complaints, such as stomach pain and diarrhea. In addition, sometimes there is blood in the stool when suffering from worms.

 


These symptoms will usually be accompanied by other health complaints, such as fatigue, flatulence, to weight loss. Do not ignore complaints of rashes or itching in the rectum area. We recommend that you immediately do an examination because these symptoms are related to intestinal worms.


If the examination shows you have intestinal worms, of course the doctor will do treatment to overcome this disease. There are various types of drugs that are often used to treat intestinal worms, such as:


1. Mebendazole

Mebendazole is one type of adult worm medicine to overcome this disease. This drug is tablet or liquid. Mebendazole can kill worms, but do not overcome worm eggs.


Make sure you take this medicine according to the doctor's advice. This is because Mebendazole can cause side effects, such as diarrhea and abdominal pain. This drug is also not recommended for pregnant women, breastfeeding, children under the age of two years, and someone with a history of drug allergy.

Flipe healthy

2. Levamisole

This is an anti -parasitic drug that works by suppressing enzymes in the worm muscles. That way, worms are unable to multiply and die slowly.


You need to take this drug according to the doctor's recommendations and doses. Excessively consuming this drug causes various side effects that can occur, such as diarrhea, nausea, dizziness, to sleep disorders.


3. Albendazole

This drug works by preventing worms absorbing sugar in the body so that the worms lose energy and die. This worm medicine also requires a doctor's prescription so that you consume it according to the right dose.


Albendazole is not for children, the elderly, nursing mothers, to someone with a history of drug allergies. This medicine is available in the form of chewing tablets and drinking tablets. Although it is rare, you should immediately check the health condition if you experience side effects, such as fever, black stool, to pain or difficulty urinating.

 


4. Ivermectin

Ivermectin is one of the worm medicine for adults. This drug requires a doctor's prescription for its use. Ivermectin needs to be consumed when the stomach is empty, usually 1-2 hours before eating.


Immediately check the health condition if during taking this drug appears allergic symptoms, such as rashes, difficulty breathing, to swelling on the face.

Flipe -Mother, you should make sure the child always consumes clean food and drinks. There are various diseases that can be transmitted from food intake exposed to viruses, bacteria, or germs, one of which is vomiting. If not treated properly, vomiting in children can cause children to dehydrate.


Muntaber is a disease that can be contagious. For this reason, you should know various causes that can cause children to vomit. Also find out various prevention so that children's health is always in optimal conditions.

 

Causes of vomiting in children

Muntaber is also known as gastroenteritis. This condition occurs when the walls of the digestive tract are inflamed due to infections caused by viruses or bacteria.


It should be aware that vomiting is very easily transmitted especially in groups of children. However, Norovirus, Rotavirus, and Adenovirus are the causes of vomiting most often experienced by children.


This happens because exposure to viral infections is so fast especially children still do not have optimal body immunity. Therefore, the spread and transmission will be very easy to occur.


In addition to the three viruses, vomiting can also be caused by bacterial infections. Usually, spread through bacteria occurs through food or drinks exposed.


For this reason, if the child experiences health complaints related to vomiting, you should avoid children with a crowd to prevent spread. Vomiting can be transmitted to others in several ways, such as:


  • Touching the mouth, eyes, and nose after holding the item being exposed to a virus or bacteria.
  • Sharing food and drinks with sufferers of vomiting.
  • Live together with people with vomiting.

Recognize the symptoms of vomiting in children

Common symptoms that will be experienced by children after vomiting are nausea and diarrhea that is quite severe. Some children experience fever conditions as an initial symptom of vomiting.


The danger, when a child releases a lot of fluids during diarrhea and vomiting, the body can dehydrated. Unrequited vomiting can cause symptoms of dehydration in children. Of course, when dehydration in children is not treated properly, this condition can cause worse health problems.


For that, immediately do an examination at the hospital when the child experiences some symptoms of dehydration, such as:


  • Dry mouth.
  • Reduced frequency of urination.
  • A body that feels cold.
  • Weak.
  • Dark urine.


Muntaber treatment at home

Until now there is no treatment or treatment that can overcome this disease directly. Provision of drugs for children must certainly be done in accordance with the doctor's advice and advice.

 

Some types of drugs given by doctors are only used to reduce symptoms in children so that children feel more comfortable. In addition, mothers can also do various treatments at home so that children's health is getting better, such as:


  • Avoid giving children foods that have a strong enough taste. Give children soft food with light taste. Mother can give children porridge or vegetable soup.
  • Give adequate fluids to avoid dehydration. Make sure the child consumes enough water. After that, you can give other drinks, such as juice.
  • Prepare healthy snacks for children, for example jelly, bananas, or bread.

Flipe healthy


Always remind children to maintain hand cleanliness after doing various activities. Teach children about how to wash the right hands to avoid various diseases that can be caused by dirty hands.

entry.title: What are structured warrants and their advantages Flipe
entry.content:
What are structured warrants and their advantages Flipe

By Flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.



Flipe - MNC Sekuritas is a business unit of PT MNC Kapital Indonesia Tbk (BCAP) and is the best reputable securities company and has received various awards. Not only providing stock investment services, MNC Sekuritas also provides a variety of mutual fund products that can be used as an alternative for investors to invest.

Apart from stocks and mutual funds, investors now have a choice of other investment instruments. The Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX) released a new investment product, namely Structured Warrants, on September 19, 2022. For novice investors, Structured Warrants may sound foreign. MotionTrade will briefly discuss the meaning of Structured Warrants and their advantages.

Structured Warrants are securities issued by Exchange Member Securities Companies, which give the buyer the right to sell or buy an underlying asset at a predetermined price and date. Investors can buy Structured Warrants and enjoy optimal profit potential just like buying shares. The following are 4 (four) benefits of Structured Warrants, including:

Flipe investasi


1. Leverage

With relatively small capital, investors can have the right to buy (Call) or sell (Put) underlying securities at a certain price and date, so that the percentage of potential profit on Structured Warrants tends to be greater than the underlying securities, and vice versa.



2. Unlimited Profit Potential

The profit potential to be obtained by an investor is unlimited, depending on the price movement of the underlying securities, while the maximum potential loss experienced is only limited to the price of the Structured Warrant.



3. Investment Hedging Facility

Put Warrants can be used as a means of hedging by locking in the selling price of the underlying securities. When the underlying price falls, the investor profits from trading or exercising the Put Warrant.



4. High Liquidity

Structured Warrants usually have high liquidity because the issuing company is required to be a liquidity provider and can appoint other Exchange Members as liquidity providers.

link.title: What are structured warrants and their advantages Flipe

entry.title: Clean and Healthy Behavior to Prevent Diarrhea Flipe
entry.content:
“Diarrhea can be prevented with a clean and healthy lifestyle. Among them by washing hands regularly, storing food properly, and meeting body fluid needs".


Clean and Healthy Behavior to Prevent Diarrhea Flipe

By Flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.

 Flipe - Diarrhea can strike anyone and is a symptom of certain health conditions. The good news is that there are several clean living behaviors to prevent diarrhea, one of which is diligently washing hands before and after eating.


The most important way to prevent diarrhea is of course avoiding contact with infectious agents that can cause it. In other words, it is important to pay attention to a clean and healthy lifestyle in order to prevent diarrhea. So, what are the clean living behaviors that can prevent diarrhea?


Some Clean Living Behaviors to Prevent Diarrhea

In addition to maintaining the cleanliness of food and drink, clean living behavior also needs attention. Here are some clean living behaviors to prevent diarrhea:


Flipe healthy


1. Wash your hands regularly

Diarrhea is often transmitted by consuming food or drink, or touching objects contaminated with bacteria, parasites or viruses. That is why the habit of washing hands is important. Be sure to wash your hands after using the bathroom, before eating, before and after preparing food.


According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) in the United States, washing hands can reduce the risk of diarrhea by as much as 30 percent. The CDC also recommends washing your hands for at least 20 seconds. Make sure to clean the backs of your hands, between your fingers and under your fingernails. Then rinse under running water, then dry thoroughly.


2. Store food properly

Storing food at the recommended temperature is one of the clean living behaviors that can prevent diarrhea. Apart from that, it is also important not to eat food that is no longer suitable, to cook food at the recommended temperature, to process food ingredients safely and appropriately."flipe healthy"


3. Pay attention to food and drink while traveling

When traveling or traveling, people tend to consume food or drinks that are not necessarily hygienic. Especially if you are traveling to a developing country. To prevent diarrhea, there are several tips that can be followed, namely:


Avoid cold drinks with ice cubes.

Buy foods that are properly prepared.

Avoid drinking unpasteurized milk or juice.

Be careful when trying local food from street vendors.

Avoid eating raw or undercooked meat.


4. Meet the needs of body fluids

The most important way to prevent diarrhea is to meet the body's fluid needs. Everyone is recommended to drink at least 8 glasses (2-3 liters) a day. Of all types of drinks, water is the most recommended. However, salt water is also good for slowing down the loss of fluids. Meanwhile, sugar can help the body absorb salt.


5. Avoid drinking caffeine and alcohol

The next way to prevent diarrhea is to avoid drinking soda, caffeine and alcohol. Seba, these types of drinks can exacerbate diarrhea. Meanwhile, soft drinks containing high fructose syrup can cause stomach pain due to digestive problems. According to research, the high fructose content in drinks can cause flatulence and diarrhea.


Even though diarrhea is a common condition, it doesn't mean it's not dangerous. In serious cases, diarrhea can lead to severe dehydration and other serious complications. Therefore, it is important to practice the clean and healthy lifestyle above to prevent diarrhea.


If you are experiencing diarrhea, you should immediately visit a doctor to get the right treatment.

link.title: Clean and Healthy Behavior to Prevent Diarrhea Flipe

entry.title: These are 4 Effective Ways to Overcome Colitis in Adults Flipe
entry.content:
“Inflammation of the large intestine or colitis can cause diarrhea, bloody stools, to abdominal pain or cramps. The good news is, this condition can be treated with medication to keep the body clean."

These are 4 Effective Ways to Overcome Colitis in Adults Flipe

By flipe.eu.org

Flipe.eu.org - Corporation Websaite Build Profesional, Beautiful & Profesional Designs.Make an Impression and Reach Your Audience. Over 40+ Ready To Use Templates.

Flipe -Colitis is an inflammatory condition of the large intestine, which is a major part of the digestive system. In a way, the large intestine is the final place of the journey of the food you consume.


If colitis or inflammation occurs in the large intestine, the process of traveling food can be disrupted. It can even cause abdominal pain, diarrhea, and blood in the stool.


Inflammation is a form of the body's response to infection or injury to the large intestine. This condition can cause swelling and pain in the intestinal tissue. Colitis can be a serious condition if it doesn't go away. In fact, it can cause serious damage to the large intestine that will affect quality of life.


So, the question is how to deal with colitis in adults?


Treatment for Colitis


There are various types of colitis which are differentiated by their cause. One of the most common causes of colitis is a viral, parasitic, or bacterial infection. For example, such as Salmonella and E. coli bacteria. Most people who experience colitis are caused by consuming food or drink that is contaminated with viruses or bacteria.


Well, the treatment of colitis in adults is based on the conditions that cause it. The following are several ways to treat colitis that doctors generally recommend:


  • Antibiotics

The first way to deal with colitis is with drugs. Doctors may prescribe antibiotics to treat bacterial infections, while corticosteroids to treat inflammation.


  • Diet changes

Furthermore, the doctor may also suggest making dietary changes. Especially if the sufferer has acute colitis which is temporary. The recommended diet is a diet low in fiber and easy to digest.


However, for cases of chronic colitis, the sufferer may need to make a special diet plan with the doctor. In addition, sufferers need to avoid consuming foods that trigger inflammation of the colon.


  • Anti-diarrhea and painkillers

The next way to deal with colitis is with anti-diarrhea and painkillers. However, if the symptoms do not improve or there is a risk of complications, the doctor may recommend surgery.


  • Operation

People with certain types of colitis, such as necrotizing enterocolitis or ischemic colitis, may need surgical treatment to treat complications. Although surgery doesn't always cure colitis, it may be needed to stop bleeding, repair a perforation, or remove an obstruction in the colon.

Flipe healthy


However, surgery is rarely performed because the symptoms of colitis tend to be managed with medications and lifestyle changes. One important lifestyle to apply to prevent various diseases, including colitis, is to maintain personal hygiene in the right way.


The Importance of Maintaining Personal Cleanliness


Being active all day outside your home puts you at risk of being exposed to various invisible pollutants and germs. They can stick to the body, causing disease, especially if the body condition is not fit.

link.title: These are 4 Effective Ways to Overcome Colitis in Adults Flipe
